fullText: As enjoyable and affecting as Harmony is—and as timely, with antisemitism on the rise worldwide—it doesn’t make the case that, among all that we must never forget, the Comedian Harmonists merit quite this degree of remembrance.

keyPhrases.quote: As enjoyable and affecting as Harmony is—and as timely
it doesn't make the case that, among all that we must never forget, the Comedian Harmonists merit quite this degree of remembrance

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic acknowledges the show is 'enjoyable and affecting' and timely, but ultimately questions whether the subject matter justifies a full Broadway production, suggesting qualified appreciation without strong recommendation.
